mapper.insert: INSERT INTO [dbo].[discounts] (identifier, cart_id, name, description, amount, amount_type, discount_id, discount_type, coupon_code, algorithm, apply_to_recurring_billing, origin, discount_group_id, created_by, created_dt, modified_by, modified_dt) VALUES (#{identifier}, #{cartId}, #{name}, #{description}, #{amount}, #{amountType}, #{discountId}, #{discountType}, #{couponCode}, #{algorithm}, #{applyToRecurringBilling}, #{origin}, #{discountGroupId}, #{createdBy}, #{createdDt}, #{modifiedBy}, #{modifiedDt} )
mapper.select: SELECT identifier, cart_id as cartId, name, description, amount, amount_type as amountType, discount_id as discountId, discount_type as discountType, coupon_code as couponCode, algorithm, apply_to_recurring_billing as applyToRecurringBilling, origin, discount_group_id as discountGroupId, created_by as createdBy, created_dt as createdDt, modified_by as modifiedBy, modified_dt as modifieddt FROM dbo.discounts WHERE discount_type = #{discountType} AND discount_id = #{discountId}
